Title: Makes all costs and expenses of the department of public service and public service commission subject to appropriation by the legislature; repealer
Summary: Makes all costs and expenses of the department of public service and public service commission subject to appropriation by the legislature on the certification of the chair of the department and upon the audit and warrant of the comptroller.
LawCode: Rpld ยง18-a subs 1-a - 5, amd ยง18-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to making all costs and expenses of the department of public service and public service commission subject to appropriation by the legislature; and to repeal certain provisions of section 18-a of the public service law, in relation thereto
